segments.text: I find myself looking out the window, past the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems so peaceful and orderly, a stark contrast to this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A neat path, low bushes, a tidy fenceâ€”it all speaks of calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost as if the outside world is unaware of the domestic drama unfolding here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light streaming in emphasizes the ordinary nature of the setting, which is ironic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can such a tranquil exterior exist alongside such internal chaos?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing water is just streaming down, ruining the lower cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children are completely engrossed in their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a strange kind of beauty, this juxtaposition of calm and impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit of disgust for the mess, really, and the lack of attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused, she might as well be in another dimension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is in her own peaceful world while everything around her spirals.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene just makes me shake my head.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a perfectly composed picture of discord.
segments.speaker: PAR
